title: Tournament problems
body: ****_{{champion:25}} _Hi. We need some help.We join to the tournament plays, but there is some problem, we cant kick 1 person from the team, who cant play now bc he isnt at home. And we cant give tickets to others, and put in to finalize. Pls answer as soon as u can. _{{champion:25}} _****

replies.body:
Please, read the [rules](https://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/hu/c/altalanos-beszelgetes/Jbyz35ZJ-a-farumok-szabaalyzata-aj) before you post in the Boards:

"We appreciate that you would like to express yourself in English and/or some other languages, but most people here can understand ONLY Hungarian. Please post in Hungarian only or join other appropriate League of Legends boards if you can't read or write in Hungarian."

Ha magyar vagy, kérlek magyarul írj a fórumra!
